author: Pavan Dahat
text:
Two mining workers were killed and one policeman was injured in a Maoist attack in Narayanpur district of restive Bastar region of Chhattisgarh on Sunday.

“Two villagers belonging to Balod and Kanker district of Chhattisgarh were killed in a blast and firing by the Maoists in Amdai Ghati of Narayanpur. Both were working for Neko Jaiswal Company in Amdai Ghati mining project,” said Abhishekh Meena, Superintendent of Police of Narayanpur district.
title: 2 workers killed in Maoist attack
